```{r}
library(pander)
library(stringr)
lor <- readRDS("lor.Rds")
```

## Improve

```{r}
text <- str_extract(lor$comment, "([^ ]+ +){0,5}improv([^ ]*)( +[^ ]+){0,5}")
temp <- is.na(text)
text <- text[temp == FALSE]
pander(as.list(text))
```
